com.threerings.opengl.geometry
Class Geometry

java.lang.Object
  com.threerings.opengl.geometry.Geometry
Direct Known Subclasses:
DynamicGeometry, SimpleGeometry
public abstract class Geometry
extends Object

Represents a geometry instance.
